Description of the Honey in which the Medicines are prepared.

Take (with the help of God) 25 ratls of the juice of sweet pomegranates and 10 ratls of the juice of sour pomegranates, 10 ratls of the juice of sour apples and one kust‘2 of pure rubb (syrup) of sweet grapes ⁸ and 10 ratls of sugat-candy. Put all the above in a clean stone kettle‚ and cook on a gentle steady fire without smoke, and keep removing the froth from time to time. Boil it thus until the mixture turns into the form of honey. It

is the medicated honey which' shall be used in the medicines I shall mention (if God will).
